Class Question

java.lang.Object
com.comp3607.questions.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a question in the game with its category, value, text, options, and correct answer

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Question(String category, int value, String text, Map<Character, String> choices, char answer)
    Creates a Question object which contains the question category, value, text, potential choices and correct answer

  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question(String category, int value, String text, Map<Character, String> choices, char answer)
      Creates a Question object which contains the question category, value, text, potential choices and correct answer
      Parameters:
      category - the category of the question
      value - the value of the question
      text - the wording of the question
      choices - the potential choices for the question
      answer - the correct answer of the choices

    • getAnswer

      public char getAnswer()
      Returns the correct answer of the question
      Returns:
